mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( user_id, email, password, name, nickname, birth_date, gender, introduction ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{introduction} )
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, email, password, name, nickname, birth_date AS birthDate, gender, introduction, created_at AS createdAt FROM users WHERE email = #{email}
